last_episode_to_air.name: Going Home (3)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Torello and his men catch up to Luca in Mexico and force him to escape but they all get trapped inside a pilotless airborne plane.

name: Crime Story
overview: The hard-boiled saga of hair-trigger cop Lieutenant Mike Torello and his obsessive pursuit of ruthless gangster Ray Luca.
tagline: You posin' for pictures? Or you gonna pull the trigger?

episodes.name: Pilot (1)
episodes.overview: Here we meet the three major players of the series: Lt. Mike Torrello, head of Chicago's Major Crime Unit(MCU); Ray Luca, a young hood about to make his mark on the underworld; and David Abrams, an idealistic public defender trying to bury his Mob-connected roots.  As the story unfolds Torrello is working with to bring down members of Chicago's underworld while Luca is taken under the wing of Manny Weisbord; one of Chicago's most powerful crime figures.  As events proceed Torrello and Luca each become aware of the other's existence.  Torello realizes that there is a new player that he must bring down.

episodes.name: Pilot (2)
episodes.overview: Here we meet the three major players of the series: Lt. Mike Torrello, head of Chicago's Major Crime Unit(MCU); Ray Luca, a young hood about to make his mark on the underworld; and David Abrams, an idealistic public defender trying to bury his Mob-connected roots.  As the story unfolds Torrello is working with Abrams to bring down members of Chicago's underworld while Luca is taken under the wing of Manny Weisbord; one of Chicago's most powerful crime figures.  As events proceed Torrello and Luca each become aware of the other's existence.  Torello realizes that there is a new player that he must bring down.

episodes.name: Final Transmission
episodes.overview: With Torello's MCU hunting a psychopath, Luca plots jewel heists and the takeover of a sports-gambling operation.

episodes.name: Shadow Dancer
episodes.overview: Torello gains a major advantage when one of Luca's burglars is connected to a robbery-homicide of a coin collector's wife. Torello finds out Julie is pregnant.

episodes.name: The Saint Louis Book of Blues
episodes.overview: Mobsters support Luca's nationwide gambling scheme. A publicity-seeking sheriff hampers Torello's arrest of one of Luca's men.

episodes.name: The War
episodes.overview: A book intercepted by Torello jeopardizes Luca's nationwide gambling operation. The Torellos meet with tragedy.

episodes.name: Abrams for the Defense
episodes.overview: Attorney Abrams falls for a reporter helping him defend a tenant accused of assaulting a slum landlord.

episodes.name: Pursuit of a Wanted Felon
episodes.overview: Conflict ruins the Torello's weekend trip. Luca situates in Las Vegas. Bigots target Abrams's relationship with Susan.

episodes.name: Old Friends, Dead Ends
episodes.overview: Torello confronts his new friend, now laundering money for the Mob. Federal investigators indict Luca and Bartoli.

episodes.name: Justice Hits the Skids
episodes.overview: Devastated by Kehoe's death, Torello stonewalls Breitel's federal investigation. Abrams joins the MCU on the street.

guest_stars.character: Prisoner L. Vee Rachmone (as J.J. Jones)
guest_stars.name: John Marshall Jones

episodes.name: For Love or Money
episodes.overview: Divorced Torello finds comfort with Inger. The Crime Unit nabs Luca's jewelry-heist team. Torello's best friend supplies the Mob with capital.

episodes.name: Hide and Go Thief
episodes.overview: Indelli and Krychek must deal with a tense hostage situation. Torello travels to Indiana to make his move on Frank Holman.

episodes.name: Strange Bedfellows
episodes.overview: Holman ideintifies Torello as a dirty cop to Breitel. After an attempt on his life, Luca takes refuge in Florida.

episodes.name: Fatal Crossroads
episodes.overview: Torello is subpoenaed to testify for Luca. An enraged Abrams jumps to Torello's defense. Luca orders Torello and Abrams killed.

episodes.name: Torello on Trial
episodes.overview: Breitel brutally cross-examines Torello. Acquitted Luca moves to Las Vegas. Torello gets a new assignment.

episodes.name: The Kingdom of Money
episodes.overview: Torello and Krychek join the Federal Task Force planning to raid Luca's new gambling business in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: The Battle of Las Vegas
episodes.overview: To take over Las Vegas casinos, Luca murders the head of a resort-workers union to put his own man in the position.

episodes.name: The Survivor
episodes.overview: Torello falls in love with a Justice Attorney's former wife, only to find out that the attorney has been molesting his adopted daughter. Molestation charges jeopardizes the Unit's investigation of Luca.

episodes.name: The Pinnacle
episodes.overview: Luca's greedy ploy to take over another casino puts his entire gambling empire in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Top of the World
episodes.overview: Luca's jubilation over his growing business turns to fear that his associates are setting him up. Luca's insatiable lust for violence proves his undoing when he rapes Pauli's girlfriend. Pauli testifies for the prosecution in Luca's trial.

episodes.name: Ground Zero
episodes.overview: After his murder mistrial, Luca clashes with a crime kingpin over plans to split up control of the sinking Luca gambling empire. Pauli changes his mind and rescues Luca from Torello as they hide in a house in the desert, a target site for nuclear testing.

episodes.name: The Senator, the Movie Star, and the Mob
episodes.overview: An overzealous senator outrages crime bosses by subpoenaing them to appear before an organized crime commission. An actress with a shady past falls for Torello.

episodes.name: Blast from the Past
episodes.overview: Torello confronts his feelings for Julie when she asks him to rescue her kidnapped husband, who is a doctor forced to tend to one of his injured kidnappers.

episodes.name: Always a Blonde
episodes.overview: The Senterros, a family of Mexican cattle ranchers, controls the marijuana trade, so Torello's unit sets up a sting operation, but detective Joey Indelli leaves to try to save a callgirl from her sadistic pimp.

episodes.name: Atomic Fallout
episodes.overview: Torello follows a crazed killer into Mexico, unaware his quarry will lead him to an arms-for-drugs operation run by an alive-and-well Luca.

episodes.name: Shockwaves
episodes.overview: Luca returns to Vegas with immunity to work for the US Government, causing revenge-minded Abrams to resign in frustration and Torello unable to get near Luca.

episodes.name: Robbery, Armed
episodes.overview: A Chicago thug, preparing for the heist of a Las Vegas casino, shoots Krychek on the eve of Torello's birthday.

episodes.name: Little Girl Lost
episodes.overview: An investigator searching for a man's girlfriend, who happens to be Weisbord's granddaughter, is murdered before he gives information to Torello. Luca offers a drug-addicted Abrams a position on his staff.

episodes.name: Love Hurts
episodes.overview: Luca falls for an actress in a movie he is financing and discovers she is more than even he can handle.

episodes.name: MIG-21
episodes.overview: A defecting Soviet pilot becomes custody of the Strike Force, which learns of plans to use him in a spy swap.

episodes.name: Moulin Rouge
episodes.overview: The Justice Department tries to deal with troubles at a new nightclub - including bombings, extortion, and racial threats - owned by a beautiful black woman.

episodes.name: Seize the Time
episodes.overview: Torello cannot identify the source of a money-laundering operation. Clemmons reveals his suspicions about Iris's new casino partner.

episodes.name: Femme Fatale
episodes.overview: A Chinese agent dupes Torello into looking for her father while she smuggles plutonium out of the country.

episodes.name: Protected Witness
episodes.overview: In return for the man's testimony, Torello offers government protection to a Chicago mobster with a contract on his life.

episodes.name: Last Rites
episodes.overview: After Manny is stricken by a heart attack, Luca demands that he be the first heart-transplant recipient. Max convinces Steve to put a hit on Luca.

episodes.name: Pauli Taglia's Dream
episodes.overview: In a dream Paulie recounts his and Luca's survival of the atomic bomb.  After nearly perishing in the blast, Luca and Paulie are taken into federal custody.  Delirious from his gun shot wounds and the blast Luca becomes totally on Paulie for their escape.  Receiving aid from a federal agent in Manny's employ Paulie rises above his usual persona as he attempts to extricate himself and Luca from their current situation.

episodes.name: Roadrunner
episodes.overview: While escorting a prisoner and his girlfriend, Torello is trapped in the desert and stalked by corrupt lawmen who want the prisoner.

episodes.name: Desert Justice
episodes.overview: The Justice Department must deal with crooked cops and feuding brothel owners when Pauli's prostitute-girlfriend is murdered.

episodes.name: Byline
episodes.overview: Torello's writer-friend plans to take down Luca by exposing him in an article.

episodes.name: The Hearings
episodes.overview: Luca is finally brought to court on racketerring charges but the trial is postponed when a military emergency happens in Vietnam.

episodes.name: Pursuit (1)
episodes.overview: Torello and his men chase Luca to Mexico where they will get no help from the US Government.

episodes.name: Escape (2)
episodes.overview: Torello and his men save Danny from certain death while Luca is told by a top military commander that he is nothing in Mexico.

episodes.name: Going Home (3)
episodes.overview: Torello and his men catch up to Luca in Mexico and force him to escape but they all get trapped inside a pilotless airborne plane.
